## RuleSet interface

A ruleset has accept or reject properties that contain rules for matching Iglu schema URIs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface RuleSet 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [accept?](./node-tracker.ruleset.accept.md) | Array&lt;string&gt; \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [reject?](./node-tracker.ruleset.reject.md) | Array&lt;string&gt; \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
